name: Tasty Yo!
description:
You could wage wars, build empires and wipe out entire civilizations, but why would you want all that when you can run a froyo shop inherited from an alien?

- make froyo
- interact with a wide range of colorful customers
- get the orders just right to earn tips
- upgrade your froyo makers to speed up production
- grow your business and customize your shop to make more money
- watch out for freeloaders
- guess which one of your customers is an undercover alien to get access to a secret formula
- make your froyo irresistible and watch the money pile up
